title: Not Even a Stuffy Nose Can Slow Down Tadej Pogačar’s Giro d’Italia Demolition Derby
content:
After winning one-third of stages so far, Slovenian finishes off superb opening Giro d'Italia salvo by leading out sprint in Napoli: 'He's just insane.'

Read the full article at Not Even a Stuffy Nose Can Slow Down Tadej Pogačar’s Giro d’Italia Demolition Derby on Velo.
author: ahood
